# lcpizza <img src="man/figures/logo.png" align="right"/>

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

**lcpizza** contains nutrition and local pricing data for core pizzas and toppings available at
Little Caesars in Canada.

## Installation

The package can be installed from GitHub using:

``` r
# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("adamoshen/lcpizza")
```

If you don't have {pak} and/or don't want to use {pak}, you can also use:

``` r
# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("adamoshen/lcpizza")
```

## Data examples

```{r}
library(lcpizza)
```

### Pizzas data

```{r}
data(pizzas)
```

### Toppings data

```{r}
data(toppings)
```
